Name: Average time from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time elapsed from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Average time for 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to lead to a 'SW-EIC Major Revision' decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Total resolution time of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' in the review process
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Declined and the end of the case

Name: Average waiting time to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' after 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time it takes 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to be followed by 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers Challenge Paper'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers Challenge Paper'

Name: Minimum time it takes from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Average time for 'SW-Reviewer Declined' before 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Total time for 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Declined and the end of the case

Name: Average time from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' before any 'SW-EIC Accept' decision
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Average time from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to the next 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' in the same case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'

Name: Minimum time from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' in revised submissions
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
